amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for Ballistic Missile Defense research and development by $628 million and to use $150 million of the savings to increase the military Variable Housing Allowance program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds authorized in the bill for Ballistic Missile Defense research and development by $628 million and to use $150 million of the savings to increase the military Variable Housing Allowance, and reallocate the remaining savings for the variable housing allowance and to increase the Basic Allowance for Quarters.
